title: What i love in ranked?
body:
You want to know what i love in ranked?

When someone goes into ranked with internet that can't handle league and turns the game into a 4v5 when if they had of just been a meatshield even and kept it at a 5v5 it was an easy win.

IF YOUR INTERNET CAN'T HANDLE THE GAME, FOR NO REASON SHOULD YOU BE FUCKING PLAYING RANKED.

replies.body:
Sometimes they play a match and their internet is fine but the next one their internet will fail.

Solution: SHOW PING IN CLIENT
